summary: FSSC Beauty Of Dawn Edition is a collection of unique high quality screenshots/artworks.
descriptionHtml:
-----------------FILE INFO--------------------

FSSC Beauty Of Dawn dition has 5 different versions:

---------------------NOTE------------------------
█Version 1, 2 and 3 all have the same theme (with golden frame). Version 4 and 5 no frame, just original shots.


1. FSSCBeautyOfDawn (3840 x 2160)

█ This is the main version, which contains 25 HD screenshots with golden frame and background music ''Beauty Of Dawn''

█ Each screenshot was carefully chosen to match the lyrics and the rythme of the song, so all screenshots will be played in order and in a loop. The display time of all 25 shots matches up to
the length of the song

█ The overall resolution of each image is 3840 x 2160


2. FSSCBoDMusicNoLoop (3840 x 2160)

█ This version is the same as the first one, but the background music will be played only once


3. FSSCBoDRandomNoMusic (3840 x 2160)

█ This version has all the origianl 25 shots from the first version plus 9 unique additinal shots

█ All screenshots will be displayed randomly

█ No background music


4. FSSCBoD1920Music (1920 x 1080)

█ This version contains all 25 HD screenshots from the first version, plus 3 unique shots different from in the first version

█ Background music ''Beauty Of Dawn'' will be played in a loop

█ No golden frame, just original screenshots in 1920 x 1080 resolution


5. FSSCBoD1920RandomNoMusic (1920 x 1080)

█ This version contains 34 HD screenshots including 25 shots from the first version, and 10 unique shots

█ All screenshots will be displayed randomly

█ No golden frame, just origianl shots in 1920 x 1080 resolution

█ No background music



-----------------INSTALLATION------------------

█ Choose one versino and extract its zip folder.

█ All files are in .scr format (screensaver file),
which can be recognized by most PC platform.

█ If you'd like to test it before installation, right click on the file,
and select "Test".

█ You can double click or right click and then select "Install" if you want to use it.



----------------UNINSTALL---------------------
█ Simply delete the .scr file



--------------------CREDIT-----------------------
█Background Music (Beauty Of Dawn):
by Malukah
Official website: www.malukah.com
Official Facebook Page: www.facebook.com/malukah7
Thank Malukah for her wonderful voice and great kindness.

█ Screenshot Authors:
Thanks a lot for all the authors' creativeness, kindness and permission.
